title: The Milky Way may be hiding a big secret at its heart: an extremely magnetic dead star
description: Astronomers suspect the heart of the Milky Way may be hiding a big secret: a rapidly spinning, highly magnetic,  neutron star-powered pulsar.
content: Astronomers suspect the heart of the Milky Way may be hiding a big secret: a rapidly spinning, highly magnetic,  neutron star-powered pulsar.
